attributes.action: Honour this man, for his great service
attributes.background:
After more than 61 years and at the age of 90, chief-bugler Antoon Verschoot has decided to stop as a bugler of the Last Post Association. 

To honour Antoon, a special Last Post will be organized on Saturday 12 December 2015 at 8.00 PM under the Menin Gate at Ieper.
